TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultipleViewPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示可為同一組資訊或子控制項提供多重表示，並在各表示之間切換的控制項。

span.span: Represents controls that provide, and are able to switch between, multiple representations of the same set of information or child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呈現多個檢視的控制項的範例包括清單檢視中 （其以縮圖、 圖格、 圖示或詳細資料，可以顯示其內容），[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)]圖表 （圓形圖、 列、 列、 資料格的值與公式）[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)]文件 （一般、 Web 版面配置，列印版面配置、 閱讀版面配置、 大綱）、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)]行事曆 （年、 月、 週、 日） 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wmp-md.md)]面板。Examples of controls that can present multiple views include the list view (which can show its contents as thumbnails, tiles, icons, or details), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] charts (pie, line, bar, cell value with a formula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documents (normal, Web layout, print layout, reading layout, outline), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendar (year, month, week, day) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wmp-md.md)] skins. 支援哪些檢視會由控制項的開發人員決定，而且是每個控制項所特有。The supported views are determined by the control developer and are specific to each control.

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

summary.span: 取得這個 的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CurrentViewProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 整數在下列範例中，取得表示目前支援的控制項檢視。In the following example, an integer is obtained that represents the current view for a control that supports . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetViewName(int32 viewId) cil managed
Public Function GetViewName (viewId As Integer) As String

param.name: viewId
param.span: 控制項專用的檢視識別項。

summary.span: 擷取控制項特定檢視的名稱。

span.span: Retrieves the name of a control-specific view.

returns.span: 當地語系化的字串，表示控制項專用的檢視名稱。

span.span: A localized string representing the control-specific view name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視識別項可以擷取使用。View identifiers can be retrieved by using . 控制項特定檢視識別項的集合與所有執行個體。The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances. 檢視名稱是適用於文字轉換語音、 點字以及其他可存取的應用程式。View names are suitable for use in Text to Speech, Braille, and other accessible applications. ## Examples 在下列範例中，從支援的控制項擷取控制項特定檢視的名稱目前。In the following example, the control-specific name of the current view is retrieved from a control that supports . [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

exception.span: 不是支援的檢視集合成員。

span.span: is not a member of the supported views collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 例如，傳遞給方法的模式識別項擷取感興趣之控制項模式，從指定。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCurrentView(int32 viewId) cil managed

param.name: viewId
param.span: 控制項專屬檢視識別項。

summary.span: 設定目前的控制項專屬檢視。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視識別項可以擷取使用。View identifiers can be retrieved by using . 控制項特定檢視識別項的集合與所有執行個體。The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances. ## Examples 下列範例中，檢視可用的控制項的集合支援的擷取控制項模式。In the following example, the collection of views available for a control that supports the control pattern is retrieved. 檢視識別碼集合的成員之後會用來修改控制項目前檢視中。A member of the view identifiers collection is subsequently used to modify the current view of the control. [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

exception.span: 不是支援的檢視集合成員。

span.span: is not a member of the supported views collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SupportedViewsProperty As AutomationProperty

summary.span: 識別取得控制項特定檢視集合的屬性。

span.span: Identifies the property that gets the control-specific collection of views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性不存在於必須使用抓取或。This property is not present in and must be retrieved by using or . ## Examples 整數識別碼集合在下列範例中，取得表示目前的檢視表適用於支援的控制項。In the following example, a collection of integer identifiers is obtained that represents the current views available for a control that supports . [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#100)] [!code-csharp[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb#102)]
